DOC.criteria: 1 . Postmenopausal abnormal uterine bleeding ; 2 . Ultrasound pelvic show thicken endometrial ( usually 5mm ) ; 3 . Family history endometrial cancer ; 4 . Other participant risk endometrial cancer ( fat , Lynch Syndrome ) 1 . Cervical cancer ; 2 . Fever ( body 's temperature high 37.5 degree ) ; 3 . Vaginitis ( exclude atrophic vaginitis ) ; 4 . Patients bear operation ; 5 . Coagulation disorder ; 6 . Pregnancy suspect pregnancy .
